name: XWUI Password Input Component
description: Dedicated password input component with visibility toggle. Wraps XWUIInput with password-specific defaults. Supports password strength meter and show/hide toggle functionality.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

showToggle.description: Whether to show password visibility toggle button

strengthMeter.description: Whether to show password strength meter

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the password input

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
